short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search and flip through my stories. Stay updated with the latest work & coolaborations of Ujwal Surampalli in your Chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ujwal Surampalli is a young prodigy, an award winning engineer, a D.I.Y specialist and a top rated next-gen entrepreneur. 

He specializes in eclectic fields and offers his services on board several start-ups & firms as a consultant. To involve him in some creative work or need help in formulating solutions to your business needs, remember is just a ping away. 

Install this Chrome extension to stay updated with his recently published work with a click. 

You can also install his official chrome app here - http://goo.gl/Ac1qVj

He is the founder of Interview Buddy (www.interviewbuddy.in). U&U is the official brand name of his business entities.
